short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Categorize tracks posted or reposted by profiles you follow on SoundCloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you feel like you follow too many profiles on SoundCloud but don't know who to unfollow, then Wader is for you!
Categorize the tracks that appear in your stream, and let Wader keep track of which profiles improves your stream, and which profiles dirties it. Unfollow all the profiles that's not up to par!
To get a score on a profile, at least 20 repost or uploads need to be categorized for that profile.
